medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Initially awoken in the morning with right back pain, which turned into RUQ abdominal pain. Reports some nausea without vomiting. Pain slightly alleviated by taking several aspirins.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, Umbilical hernia, BPH, Achilles tendonitis, Arthritis, R knee, Distant history of diverticulitis treated conservatively. Previous evaluation for cholecystitis and hernia repair but elected not to undergo surgery.
